**Barplot by sample and group tool**\
This tool represents the abundance of genus, family or species of bacteria belonging to every sample. Moreover, graphics are divided by group: H, I and J. They are representing in the following way:\
- In X-axis appears every sample recorded in data.\
- In Y-axis appears the percentaje(%) of abundance of every type of bacteria.\
- Barplots are clasified by group in three diferent boxes that represents every group.\
